page.title: 14A CHILD'S DAY- ANDREW
page.content: For my breakfast I have jam, toast and a glass of milk. I pack my bag ready for school and at 8.30a.m. I go to Neil's house. Neil's mum gives us a lift to school. I play soccer till the bell goes at 9.00a.m. We go into the class and read our books until assembly. We usually have Maths and English in the mornings. At breaktimes we play football or cricket. At 12 noon we have our dinner. During the afternoon we do topic work. At 3.00p.m. Tony Stott's mum takes me home. I usually play snooker,watch television or play on my computer. At 6.00p.m. we have tea and my job is to do the washing up. Then I play outside until suppertime. I go to bed at 9.00p.m. and in bed I listen to records before going to sleep.
